Package squidpony.squidgrid.fov

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    FOVSolver
    An interface for Field of View algorithms.
    LOSSolver
    An interface for Line of Sight algorithms.
    RadiusStrategy
    Indicates which method of dealing with the radius during FOV and LOS solving is preferred.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BresenhamLOS
    A Bresenham-based line-of-sight algorithm.
    FOVTranslator
    An Adapter which bridges FOVSolvers and allows the input and output of multiple types, as well as the compositing of multiple FOV algorithms into a single result.
    MergedFOV Deprecated 
    RayCastingFOV Deprecated 
    RayCastingLOS
    Uses a series of rays internal to the start and end point to determine visibility.
    RippleFOV
    Performs FOV by pushing values outwards from the source location.
    ShadowFOV
    Recursive shadowcasting FOV.
    SpreadFOV
    Performs FOV by pushing values outwards from the source location.
    ThreadedFOVSolver
    A threaded wrapper for an FOVSolver.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    BasicRadiusStrategy
    Basic radius strategy implementations.
    MergedFOV.MergeType
    Used when constructing a MergedFOV to indicate what kind of merge should be performed.
